message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth more to you than to me. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $9,250? This still gives you a good deal and allows me to get closer to my desired price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,875. Would you be willing to accept this price?
